html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09182023-09-25GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Acts of the Fourth Extraordinary Congress of the Universal Postal Union
PrecisOrder authorizing (1) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ACTS OF THE FOURTH EXTRAORDINARY CONGRESS OF THE UNIVERSAL POSTAL UNION; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Acts.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Acts of the Fourth Extraordinary Congress of the Universal Postal Union
precis: Order authorizing (1) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ACTS OF THE FOURTH EXTRAORDINARY CONGRESS OF THE UNIVERSAL POSTAL UNION; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Acts.
